item.title: teaching material
item.description: supervisions I am currently supervising three msc theses on Econometrics at Erasmus School of Economics I am currently supervising three msc theses on Data Science for Marketing Analytics at Erasmus School of Economics I am currently supervising two master theses within the II level master Quantitative methods and models for decision support at University of Rome UnitelmaSapienza the last two years I have supervised fourteen bsc theses at Erasmus School of Economics on Adachi and Trendafilov (2018), Vichi and Kiers (2001) and Bluszcz (2016)
